Text: Waha Backhaul Cc Kevin I spoke with Ned Higgins and he would like to have a and year price for both the FT and IT that was discussed Please feel free to contact me with any questions Regards John

RE Backhaul Rates from NNG to Waha Cc Kevin Thanks for the clarification Can you tell me if the following assumptions are correct for your pricing Minimum volume transported is maximum is day days year for years Thanks for your help John Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Tuesday July PM To KianiAslani John Subject RE Backhaul Rates from NNG to Waha John I had NNG price out volume of day for a two year term Let me know if you need further info kh x Original Message From KianiAslani John Sent Tuesday July PM To Hyatt Kevin Cc Higgins Ned Druzbik Lisa Subject Backhaul Rates from NNG to Waha Kevin I work with Ned Higgins in Enron Compression Services He informed me of some transportation quotes that you had given to him for FT from Mid to Mid as well as IT to El Paso Waha Can you please tell me if there are any minimum or maximum volumetric requirements under these prices and the term that your pricing applies to Please feel free to call me if you have any questions Thanks in advance for your help John Kiani Associate Enron Compression Services W

RE CA for NNGNonPrivilegedpst Yeah thanks Gerald JK Original Message From Druzbik Lisa Sent Wednesday July PM To Nemec Gerald Cc KianiAslani John Subject RE CA for NNG Gerald Thanks for the CA I am working on getting Unocals address for you Attached is the draft Term Sheet for your review File NNG Keystone Term Sheet July doc Thanks Lisa Druzbik Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday July AM To Druzbik Lisa KianiAslani John Subject CA for NNG Attached is the CA for the project we discussed with NNG Let me know when you want executable agreements File NNGCAdoc

Crestone Term SheetNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Attached is the most recent version of the Crestone term sheet As Chris mentioned in the conference call with you earlier today he would like to put some binding language into the term sheet Please let me know when I can come up and discuss this with you Thanks for your help John

NonPrivilegedpst Gerald Well I dont have a monitor or a working phone but other than that everything is going well in my new group Do you have plans this Sunday afternoonevening If not are you interested in grabbing a few beers or something My wife is going out of town on business so I wont have anything to do JK

RENonPrivilegedpst Jean wrote me a sarcasticfunny email that Ill tell you about I do finally have a phone though Beerdinner sounds great for Sunday evening Let me know what time youll be back in town and where you want to meet JK Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday September PM To KianiAslani John Subject RE Hey Dude Do you have a phone yet Jean would have never let that happen I am actually going to Austin this weekend I should be back Sunday afternoon sometime We could grab a beer and some dinner Sunday evening Let me know Original Message From KianiAslani John Sent Tuesday September AM To Nemec Gerald Subject Gerald Well I dont have a monitor or a working phone but other than that everything is going well in my new group Do you have plans this Sunday afternoonevening If not are you interested in grabbing a few beers or something My wife is going out of town on business so I wont have anything to do JK

RENonPrivilegedpst That sounds great Ill see you at Two Rows at PM on Sunday In case you need to contact me over the weekend because your plans change you can reach me at Home Cell Jean felt free to come over to my area on now and make fun of me in front of my new Director and VP Then she proceeded to brag about her new Mercedes S it was pretty classic Mrha JK Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday September PM To KianiAslani John Subject RE John Why dont we meet around pm How about Two Rows in the Village If you dont like I am open to suggestions Original Message From KianiAslani John Sent Tuesday September PM To Nemec Gerald Subject RE Jean wrote me a sarcasticfunny email that Ill tell you about I do finally have a phone though Beerdinner sounds great for Sunday evening Let me know what time youll be back in town and where you want to meet JK Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday September PM To KianiAslani John Subject RE Hey Dude Do you have a phone yet Jean would have never let that happen I am actually going to Austin this weekend I should be back Sunday afternoon sometime We could grab a beer and some dinner Sunday evening Let me know Original Message From KianiAslani John Sent Tuesday September AM To Nemec Gerald Subject Gerald Well I dont have a monitor or a working phone but other than that everything is going well in my new group Do you have plans this Sunday afternoonevening If not are you interested in grabbing a few beers or something My wife is going out of town on business so I wont have anything to do JK

Virtual Compression Deal with TGP Cc NonPrivilegedpst John Thanks for your help with the TGP deal Corey wants you to send him a confirmation by Tuesday of next week Gerald Nemec has the GISB and is reviewing it he will get back to us asap on it I told him to contact you with any questions Please let me know if you need anything else Regards John

Oakhill Power Update Cc NonPrivilegedpst Here is an update on Oakhill power sourcing Wholesale Generation Ancillaries Electric cooperatives and municipalities are exempt from retail deregulation We can not directly contract with AEP or whoever the wholesale generation provider would be because it constitutes a retail sale in a nonderegulated area The prevailing utility in the area must be the buyer of the power Generation ancillaries will be provided by the chosen entity through NTEC and then through Rusk The wholesale generation ancillaries contract will be a three party agreement between AEP or whoever is chosen NTEC and Rusk Swing There are consumption penalties for using more or less than the contracted MW x block meaning there is no free swing These penalties are part of the ancillary services which means that we will not have the exact specifications until Rusk receives the bids on their RFP on TD TD is provided directly by Rusk County Electric CoOp NTEC is charging us MW as an administrative fee mark up which is why the fixed TD cost from Rusk County is MW and not MW There will be a minimum TD charge from Rusk above which we pay for only what we use o For example We pay the minimum charge or actual usage whichever is higher Ricki is constructing the TD only contract which he claims will be similar in structure to the previous contract with the inclusion of TD pricing and swing I also reminded him that he needs to provide the audited financial statements to us Attached is a deal diagram with the most current information that we have Please let me know if you have any questions Regards John Kiani Associate Enron Compression Services
Oakhill Attorney ContactsNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Here are the additional attorney names Stan Springerley Rusk County Electric CoOp Christine Ryan North Texas Electric CoOp John

Oakhill Default Risk IssuesNonPrivilegedpst When Monday June PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where Geralds Office EB Discussion of default and contract fulfillment risk between Wholesale generation ancillaries provider NTEC Rusk County Electric Coop

RE StagecoachCharlespst Thanks for all of your help we appreciate it JK Original Message From Weldon V Charles Sent Friday May AM To KianiAslani John Subject RE Stagecoach John Thanks for the upate Sorry to hear this deal has been further delayed The updated gas price is as of last nights curves Thanks Charlie Original Message From KianiAslani John Sent Thursday May PM To Weldon V Charles Cc Tefel Maria Subject Stagecoach Charlie Here is an update on Stagecoach Tennessee Gas Pipeline had to refile their case with the FERC which will unfortunately delay the deal and push it out of Q and into Q or Q We were told to update the model and all pricing so we know where we stand on our valuation at this point Can you please update the gas price for us when you have a chance The load factors and the associated volumes are unchanged from the last information that we sent to you Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information Thanks John

Gas Swap Pricing Cc Charlespst Charlie Please find attached two files that contain information for gas swap pricing for the following deals NICOR Anadarko Carthage We have put notes at the bottom of each page to help clarify our request A notional price is fine for right now let me know if you have any questions Thanks for your help John

Stagecoach Cc Charlespst Charlie Here is an update on Stagecoach Tennessee Gas Pipeline had to refile their case with the FERC which will unfortunately delay the deal and push it out of Q and into Q or Q We were told to update the model and all pricing so we know where we stand on our valuation at this point Can you please update the gas price for us when you have a chance The load factors and the associated volumes are unchanged from the last information that we sent to you Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information Thanks John
